scripts.test: yarn run lint-scss && yarn run lint-python && yarn run test-python
scripts.test-links: python3 manage.py runserver && sleep 2 && linkchecker --threads 2 --ignore-url /usn --ignore-url /resources --ignore-url /search --no-warnings http://127.0.0.1:8000
scripts.build: yarn run build-third-party && yarn run build-css
scripts.build-css: node-sass --include-path node_modules static/sass --source-map true --output-style compressed --output static/css
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules yarn-error.log css static/css *.log *.sqlite _site/ build/ .jekyll-metadata .bundle
